class.name: DiscordCallInfoHandle
class.brief_description: Convenience class that represents the state of a single Discord call in a lobby.

method.name: channel_id
method.description: Returns the lobby ID of the call.

method.name: get_participants
method.description: Returns a list of the user IDs of the participants in the call.

method.name: get_voice_state_handle
method.description: Accesses the voice state for a single user so you can know if they have muted or deafened themselves.

method.name: guild_id
method.description: Returns the lobby ID of the call.
